evaluation.visualFeatures: Diffuse Erythema - cheeks and nose, inflammatory papules and pustules
evaluation.treatment: Metronidazol 0.75% gel 1-2 ggr. daily 3 to 4 months, if no effect oracea daily for 3 months, avoid sun, use sunscreen, daily gentle cleanser
evaluation.followUp: Follow-up - 6 to 8 weeks, if no improvement - referral â€“ dermatologists
